credit_line: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidery in cross stitch and other stitches
description: Worked in black, blue, green and yellow silk on linen ground.  Alphabets, borders and verse "Virtue alone has thy regard and she shall be thy great reward" in cross stitch and eyelet stitch.  Running vine border with blue and yellow daisies.
name: Sampler
